## Overall model

[counts | $\mu,\pi$] = $I_{[n=0]}(1 - \pi + \pi e^{-\mu}) + I_{[n>0]}\pi\frac{\mu^n e^{-\mu}}{n!}$  
  
## Parameters
$\text{log}(\bm{\mu}) = \bm{\alpha}^{(\mu)} + \bmX\bmbeta^{(\mu)} + \bm{\Phi}^{(\mu)} + \log(\bma)$  
  
$\text{logit}(\bm{\pi}) = \bm{\alpha}^{(\pi)} + \bmX\bmbeta^{(\pi)} + \bm{\Phi}^{(\pi)}$  

## Priors  
$\bmbeta \sim N(\bm0, \bmV \otimes \bmU)$  
$\bmV$ is spatial correlation matrix  
$\bmU$ is covariance matrix for spline covariates; has AR(1) structure  
  
    

$t^{th}$ column of $\bm{\Phi}$:  
$\bm{\phi}_{t=1} \sim N(\bm0, (\tau(\bmD - \bmW))^{-1})$   
$\bm{\phi}_t \sim N(\eta\bm{\phi}_{t-1}, (\tau(\bmD - \bmW))^{-1})$  
$\bmD = 84 \times 84$ diagonal matrix, entries correspond to number of spatial neighbors for each spatial unit  
$\bmW = 84 \times 84$ spatial adjacency matrix with nonzero elements only when unit i is a neighbor of unit j
